title: Kevin Lin Personal Site
description: Hi there! I'm Kevin Lin a Web & Information Systems major attending New Jersey Insitute of Technology. This is my portfolio website.

items.title: AI-Driven Agile and Lean Principles: A High School Principal's Guide
items.summary: Is a resource for high school principals that explores how integrating AI technology with agile and lean principles can enhance student learning and improve overall school performance.

items.title: How AI Can Boost School Performance Through Agile and Lean Strategies
items.summary: Discusses how the integration of AI technology with agile and lean principles can optimize student learning and improve school performance.

items.title: The Future of Education: Combining AI, Agile, and Lean Principles for Success
items.summary: The future of education involves integrating AI technology and implementing agile and lean principles to improve learning outcomes and student success.

items.title: A Beginner's Guide to HTML and CSS
items.summary: HTML and CSS are essential languages in web development. HTML structures content on the web, while CSS styles and formats that content. They are the basis of almost every website.

items.title: How to Improve Your Website's Usability: Tips and Best Practices
items.summary: This article provides tips and best practices to improve your website's usability. Topics include website structure, navigation design, page speed, mobile responsiveness, and accessibility.

items.title: How to Optimize Your Website for Search Engines
items.summary: Learn how to improve your website's visibility and attract more organic traffic by implementing effective Search Engine Optimization (SEO) strategies with our comprehensive guide.

items.title: Dockerizing Your Web Development Workflow
items.summary: In this article, we will discuss the benefits of Dockerizing your web development workflow and how it can simplify the process of building and deploying web applications. We'll cover the basics of Docker and provide examples of how it can be used in different development environments.

items.title: Leveraging Google Analytics for Better Web Development
items.summary: This article explores how Google Analytics can be used to inform and improve web development by tracking user behavior, optimizing page load times, and ensuring mobile optimization.

items.title: Streamlining Your Web Testing with Playwright: Tips and Tricks
items.summary: Playwright is an open-source Node.js library for automating web browsers that supports multiple web browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, and Safari. It offers cross-browser testing, easy setup, and robust testing features, allowing developers to write maintainable and readable tests that ensure consistency across different platforms.
